title: Some fonts…
content:
Hi,  
I need some fonts identified if anyone can help? Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212048im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hanne_hukkelberg_5400.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212048im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/back_ge_strike_4121.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212048im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/rs_letters_5030.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212048im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/david_blue_6614.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212048im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hostetler-38_5346.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212048im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/faith_01_5580.jpg)

 [‹ I Kant believe this logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212048/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45273 "Go to previous forum topic") [WWII Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212048/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45271 "Go to next forum topic")
author: apparatus™

comments.content:
HANNE HUKKLEBERG: Trade Gothic Extended  
I BACK GE STRIKERS: Reminds me of Franklin Gothic?

Unsure about the rest this minute...

\_\_  
Rez

David Blue could be a modified Futura or Kabel Heavy.  
RS is Rockwell.
Thanks for the responses, they all seem to be spot on. Does anyone know the other typeface used with Fleischman? And also the FAITH typeface?
The other typeface used with Flesichmann Gotisch looks like Baskerville.
